Class NewYorkStyleController

java.lang.Object
oitkmg.project4.NewYorkStyleController
public class NewYorkStyleController extends Object
JavaFX Controller for the New York Pizza View.
Author:
Kevin George, Omar Talaat

    • addToppingNYClick

      private void addToppingNYClick()
      Handles add topping click. Add selected topping to selected toppings. Won't work if toppings count is seven.
